story_21_52000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Heh heh heh... The power of Mythical Pokémon
is sublime indeed. With Hoopa, we can summon
any Pokémon we want, no matter how powerful!
story_21_52000/2401_1001_0200_10:
And it’s only the beginning... We’ll use Hoopa to
teleport more and more of them to Pasio and
sabotage this obnoxious tournament!
